attributes.action: provide free meals for all UK based and over-seas service personnel.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We believe that all serving service personnel should be provided with free meals. We believe the current "Pay as you dine" system should be scrapped as it is endangering the health of our service men and women, especially younger recruits who cannot afford to feed themselves adequately to cope with the training they undertake.
